body.p: Thus, in the 2018 Conceptual Framework the Board improved the wording to clarify its original intention. The Board reintroduced the term ‘stewardship’ and, in describing the objective of general purpose financial reporting, gave more prominence to the importance of providing information needed to assess management’s stewardship of the entity’s economic resources. That extra prominence contributes to highlighting management’s accountability to users for economic resources entrusted to their care.
